text: Frederick L. Christ (born August 6, 1930) is a retired American basketball player. He played collegiately for Fordham University. He played in 6 games for the New York Knicks (1954-55) in the NBA. ==External links== * Category:1930 births Category:Living people Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from New York (state) Category:Fordham Rams men's basketball players Category:New York Knicks players Category:Shooting guards Category:Sportspeople from Queens, New York Category:Undrafted National Basketball Association players
title: Fred Christ
